import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { CartItemsContext } from '../../components/context/cartContext'; function Checkout() { let [currQuanity, setQuanity] = useState(1); const { products } = React.useContext(CartItemsContext); console.log(products); return (

My Cart

{products.map(({ name, src, price, color, quanity, key }) => (

{name}

{price}

Color:{color}

setQuanity(++currQuanity)} className="fas fa-chevron-up" id="quanity-up" > currQuanity <= 1 ? currQuanity : setQuanity(--currQuanity) } className="fas fa-chevron-down" id="quanity-down" >
))}

Order Summary

); } export default Checkout;
